title: Anyone else tired of white people putting "hack" in front of everything?

embed.description: We have put together several amazing sleeping tips that will help you find your way to dreamland! Check out Casper! http://casper.com/household Have some sleeping tricks of your own? Would love to hear them!

body:
LIFE HACK
FOOD HACK
now SLEEP HACK.

Using internet lingo to try and sound hip. White people are getting out of control.
